name: Graveyard Shift (itch) (I3uckwheat, Mclilzee)
description:
Prototype of a roguelike typing game!

Controls: 

WASD or HJKL to move the player

the keyboard for typing words!

Gameplay:

Move the character until you bump into an enemy, type the letters as fast as you can to do damage to the enemy, but don't make mistakes! Mistakes damage you. 

You can see remaining enemy health in the battle screen, player remaining health is in the top-left of the screen.

Bringing Level Health (found in the top right) below zero before your Player Health is reduced to zero, advances you to the next level. Level health is reduced when enemies are killed, not on damage to the enemy. The Level Health is reduced by the amount of health a fully healthy enemy has. 

Be careful around corners! The enemy has nowhere to go so repeatedly attacking you is the only option! Additionally, the enemy may sometimes decide to retaliate for an attack, prompting another typing challenge when you've not moved!

Music by: https://codyloyd.itch.io/

Tiles from: https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-dungeon-tileset

Title Screen by: Taternader

Special thanks to Mclilzee for making a PR that broke the game, forcing me to come back to it and fix.
